robust_pca.utils.drawing.plot_signal¶

robust_pca.utils.drawing.plot_signal(list_signals: List[List], title: Optional[str] = None, ylabel: Optional[str] = None, dates: Optional[List] = None, style: Optional[str] = 'plotly') → None[source]¶

Plot RPCA results for time series

Parameters
list_signalsList[List]

List containing, in the right order, the observed time series, the cleaned signal and the anomalies

titleOptional[str], optional

if present, title of the saved figure, by default None

ylabelOptional[str], optional

ylabel, by default None

datesOptional[List], optional

dates of the time series (xlabel), by default None

styleOptional[str], optional

“matplotlib” or “plotly”, by default “plotly”
